name: Dr. Kurschner's Office
description:
A short visual novel set in the ADCI (Abnormal Disease Care Institution)

Follows Dr. Idaho as he navigates his new job as the assistant of Dr. Kurschner.

(If there's any issues let me know.)

Warning:

This game contains:

-Liminal spaces (somewhat)

-Mentions of sensitive topics

-Swearing

-Murder (off camera)

-People turned into dust

-Spooky monsters

There's barely any horror in this but there's enough I thought I'd tag it just to be safe.

(The ADCI is like a sci-fi project I'm working on and it's mostly a between friends thing rn so apologies if you don't get some of the context)

Credits:

https://egardepe.itch.io/hypercard - credit for hypercard which I used kinda like a template

https://ka-music.itch.io/old-radio-music-pack - music (KA_Music Soundtrack and Music Productions)

cloud video - NatureClip: Free Stock Footage on youtube

(If I forgot to credit something or missed anything out please let me know, I will change it ASAP.)
